```{r}
#| label: gene-pathways
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

load_ddh_data(app_data_dir, #defined in setup
              object_name = c("pathways"))

#pathways
pathways <- 
  make_pathway_list(input = list(content = params$content)) %>% 
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::cols_hide(columns = c(data, count)) %>% 
  gt::cols_label(
    pathway = "Pathway", 
    go = "GO", 
    def = "Description"
  )

```
`r pathways`
The pathway list is generated by querying the target gene against GO pathways.
